description: Perfect on porridge or pancakes, these roasted spiced strawberries are a great way to use up overripe strawberries.
name: Roasted Spiced Strawberries Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g strawberries, hulled, sliced lengthways into thirds

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 190°C/170°C fan-forced. Place all the ingredients in a small baking dish and toss to coat. Bake for 15 minutes, stirring halfway through cooking, or until strawberries have softened and caramelised slightly. Serve.
